text: Small: Medium: Utilitaria: VW Golf, 500L, Audi A3, Classe A e B Mercedes, etc.
Large: Station wagon-coupe e cross-over: BMW Serie 3-5, Audi A6-Q3, Alfa Giulia, Mercedes C-E, etc.
SUV: SUV: Alfa Stelvio, BMW X5, Audi Q8, Porsche Macan, Mercedes GLE, Range Rover Sport, etc.
Premium: Supercar SUV e coupe: Porsche Cayenne-911, Range Rover Vogue, Maserati Levante-Ghibli, etc.
